creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: standing figure rowing a boat near LLC; rounded and pointed land forms on bank, reflected in very calm water; Li River, Peoples Republic of China
markings: \'#10009/\'QUIET MORNING\'\', in black ink, on back; \'#A-7\', in blue ink, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON FPSA, HON FRPS, HON EFIAP/60 CONTINENTAL AVE/FOREST HILLS, NY, 11375, USA\', stamped, on back; \'8000\', in pencil, on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black ink, on back
title: Quiet Morning
